messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2568
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/27/02 1:39:31 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/27/02 1:39:31 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< Okay, now I'm wondering about the whole sex talk and what to say and when
to
say it. Never really thought about it before but now I am. >>

One thing I've realized is that you have to "have the talk" over and over.
For us, the first time came for Zoe when she outright asked (around 7 or 8)
and for Quinn when he was using the word sex in conversation so often, I
asked him if he knew what it meant (at 6, I know, I know, but if you know
Quinn this makes total sense). We talk as it comes up again and at each age
they understand the issue differently.

Paula
